system.descriptionText: If Comrade is in Cohesion, the next Melee Attack made against an Unaware Target deals an additioanl 1d10 Damage and gains Concussive(2)

description.value: If Comrade is in Cohesion, the next Melee Attack made against an Unaware Target deals an additioanl 1d10 Damage and gains Concussive(2)
